title: Combine Day 1: Kyler Murray... Drama?
itunes:title: Combine Day 1: Kyler Murray... Drama?
description:
A convention center filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the important news nuggets after the first day of the NFL Scouting Combine pressers in Indianapolis. The heroes get to sit down with Steelers GM Kevin Colbert and Bills GM Brandon Beane.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
